duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand cost structure of various components and drive down cost in collaboration with suppliers.
Establish and manage Pomega’s Supply base to ensure the best Suppliers are selected to support all development, prototyping and production activity.
Implements and leverage ERP supply chain functionality and capabilities to drive efficiency within production planning, inventory, and materials management.
Generates, manages and schedules Planned Orders, Purchase Requisitions and Production Orders.
Lead RFP/RFQ activities for your respective area and clearly communicate Pomega’s expectations.
Lead contractual discussions with suppliers (Supply Agreements/NDAs/Terms and conditions/SOWs) with prospective suppliers/partners and Memorandums of Understanding (MOU) with OEMs.
Build relationships across multiple teams (Supply Chain, Finance, Engineering, Manufacturing, Quality) and work across different levels in the organization to ensure program timelines are achieved.
Manages inventory levels to avoid excessive inventory, inventory shortages, and/or inventory inaccuracies within defined guidelines.
Analyze domestic and international shipping forecasts to achieve optimal inventory levels.

Work with and support the project team by; scheduling product delivery, assist permitting process for BESS installations, coordinating commissioning timeline and requirements, reviewing and optimizing proposed designs, and others as needed.
Prepare material variance analyses and review cycle count results to allow for appropriate recommendations for improvements.
Align with production, planning and warehouse to coordinate the forecast and ensure timely delivery.
Drive supply chain initiatives and process improvements to help the team grow in scalability.
Able to work in the office and travel domestically and internationally as needed.
Reports directly to the Plant Manager.

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree in Supply Chain Management, Operations Management or equivalent.
